page.title: 19HOME LIFE-FAMILY PETS
page.content: Many children in school keep pets and it is important for them to know how to care for them properly. Pets need regular feeding and exercise and they must have a comfortable place to rest. A survey was taken in school to find what pets or small animals were kept by our pupils. The results are as follows:- Cats l4% Dogs 32% Gold fish 26% Rabbits l0% Farm animals 2% Budgerigars l0% Hamsters 4% Other 2% 220 children took part in the survey and from the results we can see that dogs are the most popular pet.
